Dear Max P H .Dave does have many interests,and hasn’t a vindictive bone in his body.Unfortunately you can-not recognize when some-one is pulling your chain .How-ever he is far more educated than you realize and has very high standards when it comes to experimentation or persons who put forward theories without peer evaluation.
I have laughed over your personal efforts to degrade him and been most amused by his sound replies over the last half hour.
How do I know Dave.? I’ve had to put up with him as my teasing brother for 71 years. I love him.
Rob B Auckland
